title: The chick friends rules! Junior year
description: *Lie whenever necessary.*Ex-girlfriends are still girlfriends.*Bro code is forever.Trouble, trouble trouble; that’s the theme junior year. Grant and his stupid growing pains are always starting mess. Some old friends are back leaving him scratching his head in confusion. And, there’s a new girl. He is introduced to Yasmine, she’s beautiful, older and cunning. He has everything he always wanted until one night he makes a fateful gamble that changes the course of not only his life but the lives of those around him.
author: Vici Howard
